headline: Marketing leader | Helping SaaS companies grow & scale | Passionate about brand & demand
summary: B2B and B2C SaaS marketing and communications leader with more than 20 years of demonstrated success in developing go-to-market strategies, driving efficient revenue growth, and building brands at leading security and technology organizations. Expertise in establishing and leading high-performing teams and ensuring organizational alignment to deliver a positive return on investment.  Marketing Strategy • Budget Management • Team Building, Recruitment & Development • Brand & Communications •  Thought Leadership •  Demand Generation •  Performance Marketing • Marketing Automation & Operations • Product Marketing • Field & Event Marketing • Marketing Analytics
organization_description_2: Built out Cybrary's marketing team and matured the marketing program to accelerate both B2C and B2B revenue. Oversaw the management of demand generation campaigns, ABM, performance marketing, and marketing operations, with a focus on product-led growth. Collaborated with Product, Sales and Content to create a customer marketing roadmap, align across team objectives, and identify opportunities to drive expansion. Continually measured campaigns, programs, and tactics to optimize B2C sales as well as B2B opportunity creation, pipeline acceleration, and closed-won revenue.
organization_description_3: Led the modernization of Ellucian's demand engine, partnering closely with Sales, Sales Operations, Customer Experience, and Marketing to define, communicate, and execute a cohesive demand generation strategy. Deepend digital channel capabilities, while optimizing engagement with prospects and customers across their journeys. Established automated nurture flows for active demand and enhance campaign effectiveness to improve pipeline quality, quantity, and velocity. Owned MarTech stack and budget.
organization_description_4: Led all aspects of marketing, including brand and creative, revenue, product and corporate marketing, as well as developer relations. Managed a team responsible for generating revenue by increasing sales through strategic market research, pricing, marketing communications, advertising and public relations programs.
organization_description_5: Establish scalable lead generation, lead nurture, and opportunity creation campaigns that drive revenue for a B2B SaaS business entering an accelerated growth stage. Develop and execute programs that drive revenue through direct and indirect channels, including paid digital campaigns, website conversion optimization, search engine optimization (SEO), events, and field and channel marketing. Work with cross-functional teams to increase and optimize inbound traffic that converts to qualified leads and opportunities. Forecast, measure, analyze, and report on the impact of all campaigns on leads, sales pipeline, revenue, and sales cycle length. Oversee marketing budget and manage financial plan for the marketing department.
organization_description_6: Managed the demand generation waterfall to cost-effectively create pipeline, define go-to-market campaigns, and grow ThreatConnect’s brand strength.  Developed and executed demand generation and nurture campaign plans using offline and digital channels and tactics, including field marketing, large corporate events, SEM, paid social media, content marketing, email marketing, webinars, content syndication, and email. Analyzed effectiveness of all campaigns and optimized for cost and efficiency.   Aligned with sales on Marketing Qualified Lead (MQL) and Sales Qualified Lead (SQL) criteria and implemented programs to increase both lead quantity and quality. Direct day-to-day management of the Sales Development team, responsible for qualifying inbound and outbound contacts.   Worked with creative agency to create appealing materials that generated demand and reinforced the brand.
organization_description_7: Responsible for the development and implementation of Forcepoint’s brand strategy and supporting tactics to increase awareness and preference. Oversaw brand positioning, messaging and creative, working with internal and external agencies. Ensured functional alignment with brand and creative campaign. Managed Forcepoint’s internal brand, creative and digital agency of 12, including 2 managers. Capabilities included creative concepts, art direction, graphic design, production design, brand and style guidelines, Web design, Web development, proofreading, interactive design, copywriting, copy editing, video editing & production.
organization_description_8: Led a team of 6 in managing the execution and transformation of the company’s global digital experience. Drove corporate rebranding activities for new company launch, including digital advertising and social media campaigns, website replatform, rewrite and redesign, and integration plan management for marketing teams at three merging companies. Own and manage the evolution of the website, including analytics, testing and SEO, to support marketing initiatives worldwide, define site content and drive analytics and site testing, and monitor and analyze performance reports. Develop social media strategy and execute social marketing campaigns that enhance the brand, generate awareness, and improve sales.
organization_description_9: Led a team of 12, including 7 direct reports, in managing the company’s Web Marketing and eCommerce. Guided the production of copy and visual design to provide a compelling and rewarding customer experience. Aligned work with cross-functional marketing and sales goals to ensure focus on strategic and revenue-generating initiatives for the company. Oversaw SEO and site testing strategy and execution. Focused on funnel optimization to improve signups on the company website, emphasizing page design, layout, content, and entry-point optimization. Employed detailed and frequent Web analytics to measure success.
organization_description_10: Promoted into a new assignment to define and revise Dell's global Consumer and Commercial strategies for cross-functional projects such as Microsoft’s Windows 8 launch and Dell’s product launch process. Ensure marketing alignment across product marketing, product engineering, creative, public relations, online, social media, and regional marketing teams. Manage executive briefings and strategy sessions.
